analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_newTokenOwner) (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol#427-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/27/0x4d04f71a7cfb03b3a76b3d14ff08936336650fd7.sol)
